column2: Administrative Measures Adopted by the Government and the Monetary Board during the Year
Special  Deposit  Accounts  so  rolled  over  will  be  eligible  for  additional  interest  offered  by  the  Government  as  indicated  in  the

column1: Regulations published in the Gazette Extraordinary Notifications No. 2170/4 dated 08th April, 2020, subject to the directions
issued by the Central Bank on Special Deposit Accounts.
